title: 2021 Indy Bard Fest

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey chats with Glenn Dobbs (Executive Producer & Artistic Director) and Bobbi Bye (Actress, Antony and Cleopatra) about this year's Indy Bard Fest. Full Disclosure: Matthew is directing one of the productions and acting in another.
